com.example.locomotioncommotion

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.locomotioncommotion.Request

  • public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Request keeping track of all information about rider requests

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request()
        Constructor for the request class. Just makes a blank request

      • Request

        public Request(Rider rider,
               Location startLocation,
               Location endLocation,
               int fareOffered)
        Constructor for the request class. Takes all attributes but driver and status. Driver and status are set to null and pending, respectively
        Parameters:
        rider - The rider who issued the request
        startLocation - The start location of the request
        endLocation - The ultimate destination of the request
        fareOffered - The amount of money offered for this request
